@notice Contract holding vault reserves
 @dev ETH reserves are stored under address(0)
@notice returns true if the vault is allowed to withdraw from the reserve

natspec.details: ETH reserves are stored under address(0)

canWithdraw(address).notice: returns true if the vault is allowed to withdraw from the reserve

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit funds into vault reserve.Only callable by a whitelisted vault.

getBalance(address,address).notice: Check token balance of a specific vault.

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw funds from vault reserve.Only callable by a whitelisted vault.
